Body:
Why is this code not working properly?

mosquitto_sub -p 2025 -t test/topic >file1.txt	mysql  -u root -pqwerty" test<<EOF	LOAD DATA LOCAL  INFILE '/home/arjun/file1.txt' INTO TABLE t1;	select value from t1;	EOF

I have tried to copy the data from the mosquitto subscriber to the text file and then copy the data to the mysql database.the data is copied into the text file but after that the script is not executed.

Please help me
You should also include your error output.  It will assist anyone trying to help you.

You need to specify the --local-infile option when you call mysql. I also added -D yourDB to specify that you want to use this database. And I got rid of that SELECT...I don't know why you had it there.

mysql -u root -pqwerty" -D yourDB --local-infile test << EOF	LOAD DATA LOCAL  INFILE '/home/arjun/file1.txt' INTO TABLE t1;	EOF

From the MySQL documentation:

--local-infile
Enable or disable for LOCAL capability for LOAD DATA INFILE

"
well their is no error message as such...the cursor in the command line just keeps blinking
Did you give the correct database name, and also what is your error output?
